data.eml:eml: Nine true bugs (Heteroptera) newly-discovered in Illinois

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Swanson, Daniel R., Taylor, Steven J., Heads, Sam W. (2017): Nine true bugs (Heteroptera) newly-discovered in Illinois. Zootaxa 4269 (4): 571-585, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4269.4.10
